title: Twist of Luck
description: Megan finally has her luck back and hopes that life will return to normal. Unfortunately, the magical world has other plans. Suddenly, she find she has fairies following her to provide security, dragons become a constant threat, and an imp tracks her every move. As if that wasnâ€™t enough, her luck begins to manifest itself in ways she could never imagine.
author: Jaclyn Weist
